summary: Project Frenzy is a \"MASSIVE\" overhaul of Skyrim.. maintaining authenticity, and the general structure of the game.. while bringing you better, improved gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3pt][Center][IMG]http://i133.photobucket.com/albums/q67/Razorwolf49/projectfrenzylogo.png[/IMG][/Center]
Project Frenzy aims to overhaul Skyrim in a way never thought possible. We plan to bring you the most content in one mod ever! With a growing community and a team that never stops, we can\'t imagine were this will take us. Project Frenzy promises everything at top notch quality. Innovative, and creative thinking along with witty minds will come together to create something simply astounding..

[Color=#ff6600]-Hi Resolution Textures, Hi Quality Music/Sounds

-New Quests, Npc\'s, spells/weapons/armor, Houses, guilds, homes, dungeons/forts/caves/ruins, castles, mounts.

-Mulitplayer (Pvp, Campaign, Arena, dungeons, Turf Wars, Medieval Games, Dragon battles in flight).

-New Content! Expansions, pacthes, lands.. Our ultimate goal is to provide a new land for you to visit.[/Color]

                                                                                                                                            [url=http://detroitfrenzy.hostei.com/Pfportal.html][Center][IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/2416322.png[/IMG][/url]
(Click to navigate)

[youtube]By0r6CIcGFM[/youtube][/Center]


[IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/2470555.png[/IMG]
With Project Frenzy you get nothing but the best.. With resolutions of up to 4k your visuals will be stunning and detailed like never before. 
Our texture packs provides a new kick to Skyrim, enhancing color, detail and overall feel of the game. While yes our visuals are nothing short of fantastic, we made sure not to bog down your computer and our textures \"should\" provide a FPS boost over most. With almost everything in the entire game (Yes you read that right) re-textured what are you waiting for? Go download it!

[IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/2470566.png[/IMG]
Tired of doing the same old quest? Tired of restarting the game just to have more fun? Well look no further, this mod is for you! Our Main file (ESM) provides MANY new and exciting features that and to the depth and overall design of Skyrim, while yes we have added hundreds of quests, items, creatures and structures.. We have not taken the lore out of the game. Project Frenzy intends to please each and every individual user, either by showing immense detail or by providing amazing never-before-seen battles, don\'t believe we can do all that? Go try it out for yourself!

[IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/2470574.png[/IMG]
Music is always a HUGE part of any game or movie, and while yes the original skyrim soundtracks had been pretty good.. we felt it lacked in certain areas. We wanted to feel a bit scared it dungeons, we wanted creatures to sound more ferocious, we wanted to hear something simply masterful while exploring the vast landscapes of Skyrim! So we got together with a REAL PROFESSIONAL composer and created songs that will simply blow you away. Our HD Audio pack is 2nd to none, and currently the only Audio pack that overhauls the entire Skyrim experience.

[IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/2498319.png[/IMG]
We want everyone to enjoy our mod, so we always think about performance and the best way to utilize everything. With our performance pack you can potentially gain up to 25+ FPS.. Don\'t believe me? Go download it!!
 ALL of our textures have been properly compressed and have all Mip-Maps included for tip top performance and a nice smooth gaming experience.

[Center][IMG]http://images.cooltext.com/2498332.png[/IMG]

[/size]
author: Hockeyt0wn13
